description: Try our easy to follow Beef Rib Roast recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast beef,Roast,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Beef,Wheat free,Easter,Dairy free
name: Beef Rib Roast Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients for herb mixture in a bowl then rub into meat (see tip 2) and place on a rack in roasting pan. Cook for 20 minutes. Reduce oven temperature to 200°C and continue to cook for a further 60-85 minutes for rare or until cooked to your liking (see cooking times for rare, medium and well done).
Remove meat from the oven and cover loosely with foil. Rest for at least 20 minutes before carving (see tip 1). Tip 1: Carving
